name: CalFresh Employment and Training Program (CalFresh E&T)
short_desc: Prepares General Assistance (GA) recipients for possible employment through a variety of supportive activities
description: Prepares General Assistance and/or CalFresh clients, unless exempt, for possible employment through a variety of activities, including job club and job search. Employable General Assistance and/or CalFresh recipients are no longer required to participate in employment program for continued eligibility.
